definition: to thump repeatedly with one's fist
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: He has a face I'd like to punch .
sentences.chinese: 他有一张我很想饱以老拳的脸。

definition: to use violence (against sb)/to strong-arm sb/to manhandle
lit. to punch and kick (idiom); to beat up/fig. determined to sort out a problem
to square off/to exchange blows/to rain blows on sb
lit. furrowed brows and blazing eyes/to dart looks of hate at sb (idiom)
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
a black eye (idiom); serious injury to the face/fig. a setback/a defeat
